name: Demo Game - RealStick
description:
It is my oldest project that I could save  and I made this in 2015 and probably used unity3d 4 or  5  but I have upgraded with 2017.2.0f3 version therefore you have to use 2017.2.0f3 as well.  

I did whole graphics such as 3D models,textures,sprites. Also I remember color picking code wasn't belong to me and name of the game is "RealStick" because game was about becoming real man of a stickman in computer .

And this is a video about 3D environment models that i made for the game
